title: Videos (Highlights): When opening up the Videos - Highlights section all videos listed will be accurate, readable and display the correct icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN all videos listed will be accurate, readable & display the correct icon

title: Videos (Highlights): When scrolling through the Video - Highlights section initially we will see an MiLB placeholder icon before the video's thumbnail loads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
AND we have selected Videos
AND we haven't scrolled through the Videos list yet
custom_steps: WHEN we scroll through the Videos list
custom_expected: THEN we will briefly see a placeholder icon for each video before it's thumbnail loads

title: Videos (Highlights): When traversing through the Video - Highlights the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Video tab
custom_expected: THEN the formatting of the text & thumbnails appears consistent

title: Videos (Highlights): Choosing different classes changes the videos according to the class chosen
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Videos tab
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Class picker
And choose a particular class
custom_expected: THEN the videos will change the videos according the class that was chosen

title: Scenario: Thumbnail Contents/Accuracy and Legibility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has tapped on the Video tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user examines the contents of the video thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will contain a title in white bolded font
AND the time/date stamp will be below the the title
AND a Share icon will be in the lower right-hand corner (if enabled)
AND all text present will be clear and legible

title: Scenario: Highlights Index Scrollable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has tapped on the Video tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to scroll down
AND the user attempts to scroll up
custom_expected:
THEN the scrolling in either direction will be possible
AND the inertial scrolling will be smooth

title: Scenario: Tapping on Highlight Thumbnail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user taps on the Video tab
custom_steps: WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the video playback for the selected highlight will begin

title: Scenario: Ensure All Classes Present in Index
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video Index
AND we have selected the Videos tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we have tapped on the class selector
AND we are examining the contents of the class index
custom_expected:
THEN a cell for each of the classes will be present
AND the classes will be listed in this order: Triple-A,Double-A,Class A Advanced,Class A, Class A Short Season, and Rookie

title: Scenario: Using Controller UI During Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has tapped on the Video page
AND the user has tapped on the Videos tab
AND the user taps on a Video Thumbnail
AND the user notices that playback has started
custom_steps: WHEN the screen is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the video controller UI will appear onscreen
AND all button/controllers will perform their specified functions correctly

title: Scenario: Double-A Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has enabled Double-A mode
AND the user has navigated to the Video page
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected:
THEN only Double-A Video Highlights will display
*Test for ALL classes*

title: Scenario: Triple-A Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has enabled Double-A mode
AND the user has navigated to the Video page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the class selector on top center
AND Chooses Triple A
AND returns to the Video page
custom_expected:
THEN the Double-A Video Highlights will no longer be present
AND only Triple-A Video Highlights will display
*Test for ALL classes*

title: Scenario: Enable/Disable Highlight Sharing
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are video highlights set up in QA
custom_steps:
WHEN the value <keyword type="mmtax" value="shareable"/> of the following xml: 

Prod: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/${leagueOrClass}.xml
QA: http://qa.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/${leagueOrClass}.xml

> Example: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/pacific-international.xml
> Example: http://www.milb.com/gen/hb/video/mobile/double_a.xml
custom_expected: THEN the video highlight share icon will be visible/not visible on a given highlight depending on the setting (both scenarios must be tested)

title: Scenario: Tapping Share Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Highlights index
AND there are highlights that are shareable in the index
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the share icon in the lower right corner of the thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN a menu will pop up
AND will contain a Tweet button
AND will contain a Post to Facebook button
AND will contain an Email a Link Button
AND will contain a Message button
AND will contain a Cancel button

title: Scenario: Twitter - Not Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged into Twitter
AND taps on the share icon
custom_steps: WHEN the Tweet button is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the following error message will appear:
> Twitter Issue
> Tweeting MiLB content requires that
> you enable a Twitter account on
> your device. Go to your Settings
> application to set one up.

AND will contain an OK button that is tappable & will cause the error message to disappear when tapped

title: Scenario: Twitter - Ensure Tweet is Properly Formatted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into Twitter
AND on a video highlight that's sharable
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow
AND Selects Tweet
custom_expected:
THEN the tweet sheet should appear
AND the format should display the title of the video followed by Sent with MiLB First Pitch
AND the last line should be the actual link to the video, but it will only appear on the actual tweet, not the tweet sheet

title: Scenario: Facebook - Not Logged In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not logged into Facebook
custom_steps: WHEN the Share button is tapped on video
custom_expected: THEN the user will not be able to see the Facebook icon listed

title: Scenario: Facebook - Account is not setup on device
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into Facebook on the device
custom_steps: WHEN the Post to Facebook button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the Post to Wall page will open

title: Scenario: Facebook - Ensure Status is Properly Formatted
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Videos page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow
AND then taps on Post to Facebook
custom_expected:
THEN the Facebook Post to Wall page will appear
AND the actual post will display the video thumbnail & caption followed by milb.com

title: Scenario: Email a Link Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the the user has set up an email account on the device
custom_steps: WHEN the Email a Link button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN device's native email client will open an email form

title: Scenario: Email a Link Properly Formatted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Videos page
AND has an email account setup on the device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share button for a Video
AND selects the Email a Link button
custom_expected:
THEN the email draft will appear
AND be formatted with the video highlight title, the date & Sent with MiLB

title: Scenario: Message
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has tapped the share icon on a video thumbnail
custom_steps: WHEN the Message button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the device message client will open

title: Scenario: Message Formatted Properly
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Video Highlights page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow on the video
AND then taps on the Message button
custom_expected:
THEN a New Message screen will appear
AND once the message is sent it will be formatted with just a video link that will push on the wap site
